tool_description: Choose from a variety of shapes, colors, logo, and gradients to truly make your QR code stand out, and if you come across a style that you love and would like us to add to our collection, please don't hesitate to contact us. Check out **about** tab to get started.
name: QR Code Creator
title: QR Code Creator

api_list.name: upload image
api_list.description: upload an image file that can be used as a background or a logo for your QR code. The file name of the image must contain the extension (.png or .jpg) to indicate the file format. For example, logo.png or background.jpg.

api_list.name: create text QR Code for testing purposes
api_list.description: Allows you to create QR codes for testing purposes, you cannot customize the text encoded in the QR code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-creator3.p.rapidapi.com/create-text-qr-code-test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-creator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
